Detailed Description

Parameters of the APS_EstablishKeyReq() function.

The structure conforms to APSME-KEY-ESTABLISH.request primitive defined in ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.5, page 441.

Definition at line 141 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_EstablishKeyReq_t::responderAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the responder device.

Definition at line 160 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

bool APS_EstablishKeyReq_t::useParent

This parameter indicates if the responder's parent shall be used to forward messages between the initiator and responder devices:

  • TRUE - Use parent,
  • FALSE - Do not use parent.

Definition at line 166 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_EstablishKeyReq_t::responderParentAddress

[LE] If useParent is TRUE, then the responderParentAddress parameter shall contain the extended 64-bit address of the responderâ€™s parent device. Otherwise, this parameter is not used and need not to be set.

Definition at line 171 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

APS_KeyEstablishmentMethod_t APS_EstablishKeyReq_t::keyEstablishmentMethod

Requested key-establishment method. The valid value is SKKE.

void(* APS_EstablishKeyReq_t::APS_EstablishKeyConf)(APS_EstablishKeyConf_t *conf)

Confirmation callback function. Must not be set to NULL.
